long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just the Links is a web browser plugin. A web browser plugin changes how a computer shows the internet to a human. Just the Links makes web browsers only show humans the hyperlinks in Wikipedia articles. A hyperlink is an internet reference to somewhere else on the Internet. Scientists widely agree that hyperlinks are the only important part of the internet.
